member.name: T:JSR.Utilities.ObjectUtilities
member.summary: Creates and manipulates objects and their properties.

member.name: M:JSR.Utilities.ObjectUtilities.CopyValuesFromObjectToObject``1(``0,``0)
member.summary: Copies the values from one object to another.
member.typeparam: Type of object to perform the copy.

member.name: M:JSR.Utilities.ObjectUtilities.GetSerializedCopyOfObject``1(``0)
member.summary: Creates a copy of an object using serialization.
member.returns: A copy of .

member.name: M:JSR.Utilities.ObjectUtilities.CreateInstanceWithRandomValues``1
member.summary: Creates a new instance of a specified type and populates all of its properties with random values.
member.returns: A new object with random property values.

member.name: M:JSR.Utilities.ObjectUtilities.CreateInstanceWithRandomValues``1(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Creates a new instance of a specified type and populates specified properties with random values.
member.param: List of property names to add random values to.
member.returns: A new object with random property values for the provided property names.

member.name: M:JSR.Utilities.ObjectUtilities.CreateInstanceWithRandomValues``1(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Reflection.PropertyInfo})
member.summary: Creates a new instance of a specified Type and populates specified properties with random values.
member.param: List of to populate with random values.
member.returns: A new object of the specified Type.

member.name: M:JSR.Utilities.ObjectUtilities.CreateInstanceWithRandomValues(System.Type)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of a specified Type and populates all of its properties with random values.
member.returns: A new object of the specified type with populated values.

member.name: M:JSR.Utilities.ObjectUtilities.CreateInstanceWithRandomValues(System.Type,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of a specified Type and populates all of its public set properties.
member.param: List of property names to add random values to.
member.returns: A new object of the defined type with populated values.

member.name: M:JSR.Utilities.ObjectUtilities.CreateInstanceWithRandomValues(System.Type,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Reflection.PropertyInfo})
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of a specified Type and populates specific properties with random values.
member.param: List of to populate with random values.
member.returns: A new object of the specified type with populated values is specific properties.

member.name: M:JSR.Utilities.ObjectUtilities.PopulateObjectWithRandomValues``1(``0)
member.summary: Populates an object's properties with random values.

member.name: M:JSR.Utilities.ObjectUtilities.PopulatePropertiesWithRandomValues``1(``0,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Adds random values to the specified properties of an object.
member.typeparam: Type of object with properties to populate.
member.param: List of Property Names specifying which properties to populate values.

member.name: M:JSR.Utilities.ObjectUtilities.PopulatePropertiesWithRandomValues``1(``0,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Reflection.PropertyInfo})
member.summary: Adds random values to the specified properties of an object.
member.typeparam: Type of object with properties to populate.
member.param: List of specifying which properties to populate values.

member.name: M:JSR.Utilities.ObjectUtilities.PopulatePropertyWithRandomValue``1(``0,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a random value to a property.
member.typeparam: Type to add the property value to.
member.param: Object to add the property value to.
Name of the property to add a random value to.

member.name: M:JSR.Utilities.ObjectUtilities.PopulatePropertyWithRandomValue``1(``0,System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Adds a random value to a property.
member.typeparam: Type to add the property value to.
member.param: Object to add the property value to.
Property to add the value to.

member.name: M:JSR.Utilities.ObjectUtilities.PopulateListWithRandomValues``1(``0,System.Type)
member.summary: Populates a list with Random Values.
member.param: List to populate with random values.

member.name: M:JSR.Utilities.ObjectUtilities.AddRandomItemsToList``1(``0)
member.summary: Add a random number of new items to a list.

member.name: M:JSR.Utilities.ObjectUtilities.ChangeListItems``1(``0,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Changes the items within a list to populate them with new random values.
member.typeparam: Type of list with items to change.
member.param: Change all items in list. False changes random items.
